name: Don't Stop (itch) (bl4ck)
description:
Controls: Move with WASD, Crouch with LShift.
This is a pretty simple game, made in an hour. if you have any questions join my discord: https://discord.gg/HZB4nnWnvc


it's a pretty decent concept and can be pretty fun!
The goal of the game is to keep moving while dodging some walls.-
